```{r setup, include=FALSE}

# Loading in Data 
df <- data.frame(USArrests)
head(df)
str(df)

# Testing Generic Functions
plot(USArrests$Murder, USArrests$Assault,
     main = "Scatterplot of Murder vs Assault (USArrests)",
     xlab = "Murder (per 100,000)",
     ylab = "Assault (per 100,000)",
     pch = 19,          # solid circles
     col = "steelblue") # color

methods("plot")
# Exploring S3 and S4

s3_obj <- list(name = "Kevin Durant", age = 37, position = "SF" )
class(s3_obj) <- "s3Player"
methods("print")

setClass("s4Player",
         slots = c(name = "character", age = "numeric", position = "character"))
s4_obj <- new("s4Player", name = "Lebron", age = 40, position = "SF")
methods(class = "s4Player")

print(s3_obj)
print(s4_obj)

# Testing if an object is s3 or s4
isS4(s3_obj)
typeof(s3_obj)
isS4(s4_obj)
typeof(s4_obj)


```
